name: Tour Guide Sniper
description:
Your 4 Targets are scattered throughout 3 different location with a high population of Tourists. They are blending in with 500+ uniquely dressed Tourists making this mission very difficult. 
  • Left Mouse Button - Selecting/Firing
  • Right Mouse Button - Use your Tool
  • ESC - Pause the Game
Your tool 'Check Target' allows the player to review the List of Targets at the small cost of time penalty. This is what's available in the demo
  • 3 Playable Levels
  • Over 1.000 unique Tourists
  • Arcade Mode which contains two game types
  • Classic Game Mode - Each play though gets increasingly harder with a counter for your kills
  • Time Attack Game Mode - Like Classic Mode but harder
  • Practice Mode which contains two game types
  • Casual Game Mode - allows player to create a custom experience
  • Random Game Mode - creates a completely random scene giving the player a unique experience each time you play
  • Fun and Heart-Pumping Music
And here's what we want to add to the finished game
  • Leaderboard and High Score features to be the best amongst your friends
  • Mobile builds for Android and iOS
  • More Levels
  • More Music
  • More Tourists
  • More Everything
